name: Athletic Stance Holds
step_by_step: Hold athletic stance with knees bent and chest tall

name: Forward March Mechanics
step_by_step: March forward emphasizing knee drive and posture

name: High-Knee Skip
step_by_step: Skip forward with explosive vertical skips
coaching_cues: focus on explosive and soft landing

name: Single-Leg Balance Reach
step_by_step: Balance on one leg while reaching forward and sideways

name: Lateral Shuffle Mechanics
step_by_step: Shuffle laterally maintaining athletic stance

name: Single-Leg Hurdle Step-Over
step_by_step: Balance on one leg and step over low hurdle, alternate legs each rep

name: Two-Foot Hurdle Jump (Higher)
step_by_step: Jump over hurdle with two feet and stick the landing

name: Single-Leg RDL Reach
step_by_step: Hinge on one leg reaching opposite hand forward

name: Lateral Bound Hold
step_by_step: Bound laterally and stick the landing

name: Quick Feet Ladder (1-in)
step_by_step: One foot in each box moving forward

name: Quick Feet Ladder (2-in)
step_by_step: Two feet in each box moving forward

name: T-Pattern Shuffle
step_by_step: T-shape shuffle and backpedal

name: Z-Pattern Run
step_by_step: Zig-zag run changing direction

name: Deceleration Drop Step
step_by_step: Accelerate then drop hips to stop

name: Forward → Lateral Transition
step_by_step: Jog forward then shuffle sideways

name: Reaction Point Call
step_by_step: Move toward called direction cue

name: Reaction Ball Drop
step_by_step: React to unpredictable bounce

name: Mirror Shuffle
step_by_step: Mirror partner’s lateral movement

name: Single-Leg Hop Stick
step_by_step: Hop forward and stick landing

name: Forward Skip to Stick
step_by_step: Skip forward then stick landing

name: Lateral Two-Foot Hurdle Jump
step_by_step: Jump laterally over hurdle with two feet and stick landing

name: Forward Run → Backpedal
step_by_step: Run forward then backpedal back

name: Balance Beam Walk
step_by_step: Walk heel-to-toe along line

name: Lateral Cone Tap
step_by_step: Shuffle and tap cones side to side

name: Reaction Color Call
step_by_step: Move to cone color that’s called

name: Single-Leg Forward Reach
step_by_step: Reach forward while balancing on one leg

name: Quick Step-Over Hurdles
step_by_step: Quick step-over pattern

name: Lateral Step-Over Hurdles
step_by_step: Step laterally over hurdles

name: Forward Accel → Hold
step_by_step: Accelerate then hold athletic stance

name: Lateral to Forward Hurdle Jump
step_by_step: Jump laterally over hurdle then immediately forward over next hurdle

name: Lateral Shuffle + Reach
step_by_step: Shuffle laterally adding arm reach

name: Reaction Clap Start
step_by_step: Start movement on clap cue

name: Lateral to Forward Hurdle Jump
step_by_step: Jump laterally over hurdle then immediately forward over next hurdle

name: Forward to Lateral Hurdle Jump
step_by_step: Jump forward over hurdle then immediately laterally over next hurdle

name: Half-Body Bear Crawl Control
step_by_step: Start in bear crawl, move right arm and right leg only for several steps, then switch to left side
coaching_cues: Keep hips level, slow and controlled

name: Lateral Paired-Limb Crawl
step_by_step: Reach right arm and right leg laterally, then bring left arm and left leg to meet, repeat both directions

name: Lateral Single-Leg Jump to Vertical Jump
step_by_step: Perform a lateral jump on one leg immediately followed by a vertical jump on the same leg
coaching_cues: Stick the landing before next rep

name: Half-Body Bear Crawl Control
step_by_step: Start in bear crawl, move right arm and right leg together for several controlled steps, then switch to left side

name: Banded Stride Circles
step_by_step: With band around waist or ankles, extend leg into full stride and circle back under control
coaching_cues: Full extension, hips level, control return

name: 90° Single-Leg Hop
step_by_step: Hop 90 degrees on single leg and stick landing

name: Banded Side Steps
step_by_step: With band above knees, step laterally maintaining athletic stance

name: Banded Ankle Side Steps
step_by_step: With band on ankles, step laterally maintaining posture

name: Banded Ankle Strides
step_by_step: With band on ankles, step back into full stride and return to start

name: Side Shifting Squats
step_by_step: Wide stance squat shifting weight side to side

name: BOSU Banded Stride Work
step_by_step: Stand on BOSU, banded leg strides outward and returns

name: BOSU Open Hip Rotation
step_by_step: On BOSU, lift leg, open hip 90°, rotate back under control

name: Crossover → Hill Explode
step_by_step: Crossover step then immediately sprint uphill

name: Skater Hop → Bunny Hop
step_by_step: Perform lateral skater hop immediately into two-foot vertical hop

name: Partner Explosive Lunge
step_by_step: Partner holds rear leg lightly as athlete explosively lunges forward

name: BOSU Banded Side Stride
step_by_step: On BOSU single leg, banded stride horizontally then return

name: Elevated Box Bunny Hop → Sprint
step_by_step: Hop off box into bunny hops then sprint immediately

name: Elevated Box Bunny Hop → Soft Stick
step_by_step: Hop off box into bunny hops and finish with controlled soft landing

name: Horizontal Bunny Hops
step_by_step: Explosive two-foot lateral hops over single hurdle repeatedly

name: Controlled Crossover Mechanics
step_by_step: Perform slow exaggerated crossover steps focusing on full push and hip extension
coaching_cues: Push under body, chest tall, control first then speed

name: Crossover Bound Distance
step_by_step: Explosive crossover step into powerful lateral bound for distance
coaching_cues: Drive through outside hip, stick landing

name: Brake → Crossover Sprint
step_by_step: Sprint laterally, brake hard on outside leg, immediately crossover and sprint opposite direction

name: Forward Pogo Series
step_by_step: Small quick pogo jumps forward keeping legs mostly straight
coaching_cues: Minimal knee bend, quick ground contact

name: Lateral Pogo Series
step_by_step: Quick small side-to-side pogo jumps

name: Split-Stance Pogo
step_by_step: In split stance, perform small rapid pogo jumps emphasizing front leg stiffness

name: Split-Stance Bound
step_by_step: Explode forward from split stance into long bound and stick landing
coaching_cues: Push through front hip, full extension

name: Split-Stance Lateral Bound
step_by_step: Explode laterally from split stance into powerful side bound
coaching_cues: Drive off inside edge, stick landing

name: Forward Sprint → Hard Stop → Re-Accel
step_by_step: Sprint forward, drop hips to stop quickly, immediately re-accelerate forward
coaching_cues: Sink hips, powerful first step out

name: Lateral Brake → Vertical Jump
step_by_step: Shuffle laterally, brake hard, immediately explode into vertical jump

name: Drop Step → Sprint
step_by_step: Perform defensive drop step then immediately sprint forward

name: Backward March Mechanics
step_by_step: March backward emphasizing knee lift and posture
coaching_cues: Stay tall, drive back through toe

name: Backward Crossover Mechanics
step_by_step: Perform slow backward crossovers focusing on full push
coaching_cues: Push under hips, control edge position

name: Forward → Backward → Forward Transition
step_by_step: Sprint forward, pivot to backward, pivot again to forward sprint

name: A-Skip (Sprint Mechanics)
step_by_step: Perform A-skip emphasizing knee lift and foot strike under hips

name: Straight-Leg Bound
step_by_step: Perform straight-leg bounding with minimal knee bend

name: Flying 10 Sprint
step_by_step: Build up gradually for 20 yards then sprint max speed for final 10

name: Crossover → Rotational Jump
step_by_step: Perform crossover step then explode into rotational jump

name: Open-Hip Projection Bound
step_by_step: Open hips slightly and explode into lateral-forward bound

name: Reactive Drop Step Sprint
step_by_step: On visual cue, perform drop step and sprint immediately

name: Reactive Crossover Chase
step_by_step: React to partner movement and perform crossover sprint to match
